Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Thank you for comment and for your question.  The internal exchange rate we are planning to take in exchange for other currencies around the world will depend on several factors, such as the overall volume of the Kheper Tokens in the markets and accordingly, based on the specific types of market in which the Kheper Token will have a greater number of transactions (for example in relation to a possible access via fiat currency or not).  Additionally, other factors that might influence our strategy could be represented by the costs of the transactions charged by the exchangers and the methods of payment involved. As our fee, we intend to adopt a fixed fee for the exchange equal to 0.5 %.  Having said that, though, our aim is to make the fee and the cost for the exchange as low as possible whatsoever.

Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: The uniqueness of the Kheper online platforms lies essentially in the fact that our platforms will allow a direct access with fiat currency to Kheper Token. The goal, in fact, is to allow gamers with no technical experience to have both access to the crypto online gaming world and to the cryptocurrencies ecosystem.  With regard to the benefits for the casino in using the blockchain technology, reference has to be made on how the relative transactions will actually work. In making use of the blockchain technology the casino will have the unique benefit to handle the transactions and the payments in a more efficient way, with the utmost transparency.  To conclude, the uniqueness of the Kheper Project lies in combining the centralized system for the programming of the games and in the use of the blockchain in managing all the transactions related to the games, additionally allowing the players a fast cash out from the online gaming platforms.

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Thank you for your feedback Megalucker1.  Own a blockchain doesn't necessarily mean something positive for the project. Considering the risks and difficulties in managing a blockchain, we decided to base our project on a proven and solid technology, thus to enhance all the potential of the project itself.  ERC-20 is surely a standard token, however this type of token has been duly tested in the last few years and has been used in many successful projects. That said, the ERC-20 token has all the functionalities and features that are necessary for our project. The choice of using a different and not fully proven standard token, in our case, could have meant risks for all the investors and for all the participants in our projects.    Furthermore, if we had chosen to use our own blockchain, thus could have led to not be accepted from the exchanges.      As said, the goal of our project is to bring the blockchain and its technology into the everyday life of players as soon as possible. At the end of September, we are going to release our gaming management platform that will permit to the existing online casinos to accept players interested in gambling with crypto. As you can see from our website, https://kheper.bet/, among our partnerships there is replatz.it, an online casino, with an yearly revenue of about USD 100 million.  Many companies within the gambling industry believe that the blockchain represents  the future for their businesses to grow. However, they are having difficulties and problems in understanding how to approach this market in the best and most effective way: given that, the Kheper Project and we as team Kheper want to represent the bridge between those companies and regular players who are looking for a new exciting gaming experience.

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: The Kheper Project has several features and characteristics that make our Project unique among the crypto-gambling related projects. In this respect, in fact, after months of research, we have been able to solve some of the most troublesome issues within the crypto-gaming world.  In developing the Kheper Project we have managed to design an online gaming platform which, at first, allows an easy access to crypto gaming with fiat & crypto. Players, in few easy steps, have access to the gaming platform functioning in crypto using fiat currency: the Kheper platform, therefore, works as an online gaming platform designed to provide an instant exchange from fiat currencies into Kheper Token.  Additionally, we are developing the first Real Slot Machine specifically functioning in Kheper Token, thus to further expand the use of the Token within the whole gaming industry.   Another relevant feature of our Project resides in the creation of one e-wallet for online and physical games combined. We are planning to integrate online gaming platforms with physical games via one unique crypto e-wallet. The aim is to allow players to remain connected with our games all the time.   Eventually, in our vision, we want to greatly improve the future perspectives for land-based casinos. To date, in fact, casinos are struggling to innovate and to exploit blockchain technology opportunities. Thanks to our Project, we are going to allow the use of the Kheper Token directly into the land-based casinos, resolving the problem of the acceptance of different currencies in the casinos, as well as the transferability of money around the world.

As the project moves along, we will choose the most efficient solution accordingly. Surely the use of a QR code might be a very good option!

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Our is a B2B model in which we are going to sell managing platforms to online casinos, wanting to open their businesses into the cryptocurrency market.   Inside the platform are provided all the tools to efficiently manage both a fiat casino and a casino functioning in token KHP. Tools like customer relationship management, marketing segmentation, KYC (Know Your Customer) will be made available, alongside a set of games such as slots (provided by the current leading gaming companies such as Microgaming). Later on, following the road map of our project, we are also planning to make specific crypto related slots, as something unique for our gaming platforms.

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Hello Dreaming, thank you for asking. Concerning the physical industry, we as team Kheper together with our advisors are analyzing the countries that are regulating cryptocurrencies and their use within the gambling industry.  That's why we chose Malta as the headquarter of our company: in fact, the Maltese government is creating a legal framework to accept cryptocurrencies. That said we are planning to introduce physical machines in Malta first and then enter into other markets like Switzerland where the authority is in the process of regulating the use of cryptocurrency, gambling included.

Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Since 2004 Malta has become an igaming leader in Europe. With more than 280+ companies, the online gambling industry already takes account of 12% Malta GDP.   This sector is vital for them, and they want to become an authority for cryptocurrency as well.  That's why they are opening so much.  If you're interested in the topic, we wrote an article about Malta https://medium.com/@kheper.token/malta-where-gaming-meets-blockchain-aa01e2ba3fc5

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: Through blockchain, players will be able to get control of their funds.  They will be able to use the Kheper token in online casinos,  physical slots, and roulette and even land-based casinos.  Players will be able to interchange gaming platforms (between online and physical ones) cheaply, safely and conveniently through just one wallet.    Land-based casinos will attract a new pool of international customers solving the issue of bank transfer limits of speed and cost.  Authorities will be able to trace every transaction so they can fight money laundering and illegal gambling activities.  The whole ecosystem will benefit.

Author: Kheper-manager
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN][ICO]Kheper™ Online and land-based gambling all in one token🎲🎰 🔥🔥
Body: As specified in our White Paper, the Kheper Project's purpose is essentially to combine the standard system of games with the efficiency of the blockchain technology.  In order to do so and with the goal to realize our vision, in the early phase of our project the odds relating to the games will be similar to the standard ones in the European framework.  In this way we can rely on an efficient system for the programming of games, using the blockchain technology for the related transactions, maximizing the final result.  As the project moves forward and the technology evolves, we are planning to integrate smart contracts for the programming of games and odds, thus in order to provide the best services to the market and within the gambling industry.
